data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_0
data.value: Seems like an order for charts from Cornifer. Maybe his wife will allow you to take the charts in his name after showing her this?

data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_1
data.value: A journal that was buried deep within the kingdom. The only thing that you can read on this is "Silksong Release Date". What could that be?

data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_2
data.value: A special seal alloyed in silver, to make it look more shiny. But since it was buried below dirt, it did lose most of it.

data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_3
data.value: A King's Idol forged in bronze, opposed to all other greyish relics related to the Pale King, which does seem odd.

data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_4
data.value: An arcane egg crafted with pure gold. It emits some threating aura... somehow.

data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_5
data.value: A special key, once in the possession of the Pale King. Legend say, that he could use this to open (almost) every lock in the entire kingdom.

data.name: Shop_Desc_Special_Treasure_6
data.value: The highest award a member of the moth tribe could receive. It is said, that those who are wielding this amulet can catch dreams of others more easily.

data.name: SoldEgg
data.value: A golden version of an arcane egg? Oh, how exceptional! If this contains secret knowledge from the ancient civilization that lived here before Hallownest? I'm honestly very excited to look into this. If you can bring me more arcane eggs, even normal ones, I'll add a huge amount of geo for your service. Why I still give you just 500 for this? Well... what is that behind you?

data.name: SoldIdol
data.value: Ugh, what is that? A bronze version of the idols? Why would you do this? This does look rather unpleasant. Maybe it was the first of it's kind or something? Oh, in that case... that would make a set with this much more valuable and interesting. If I can figure out why the first one would be bronze that would open a whole lot history left forgotten...

data.name: SoldJournal
data.value: Interesting, it seems like this a special kind of journal. It depicts some kind of date, but only a small part of it... Ah wait a moment, I think I've seen those patterns before. Yeah, on the other journals scattered around this kingdom. If I can assemble them all, maybe I'll be able to tell when this mysterious "Silksong" may occur. Listen up, these journals are now way more valueable to me then before, which means I'm down to pay way more for them. Additionally for bringing me the main piece, let me give you a bonus right on the hand. Now go and collect the journals for me.

data.name: SoldSeal
data.value: This seal does seem special. It is little bit larger than the other ones and covered in a silver shell. But over the time it seems that it has lost its shiny appearance, what a shame. Anyway let me give you a small reward for bringing me this. You know what, I'm willing to pay even more for those relics. There must something special about them, especially now that I see this. I'll give these a closer look...
